name: Vaskr
description:
In this game, you play as Hella, the daughter of Hel, Queen of Helheim, the underworld. You rebelled against your mother after discovering what she has planned for humanity... 
This is just a propotype of the gameplay, though. And I would love to hear the feedback from you guys.
Programming - Gabriel Maia
Art - Giuseppe Mattos & Guilherme Caputo
Sound Design - Hermano Noletto
